category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSE_expand_on_open
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the root node of an assembly is expanded when opened in Structure Manager, Manufacturing Process Planner, and Multi-Structure Manager. Valid Values: 0 - The root node of an assembly is not expanded when opened in Structure Manager, Manufacturing Process Planner, and Multi-Structure Manager. 1 - The root node of an assembly is expanded when opened in Structure Manager, Manufacturing Process Planner, and Multi-Structure Manager.
